kun reading compounds: 噛む【かむ】to bite, to chew, to gnaw, to masticate, to fumble one's words (esp. during a play, broadcast, etc.), to falter with one's words, to stutter, to stammer, to crash against (e.g. of waves), to break onto (shore), to engage (of cogs, zippers, etc.), to mesh, to fit together, to be involved in, to convince, to persuade
齧る【かじる】to gnaw, to nibble, to bite, to munch, to crunch, to dabble in, to have a smattering of
